value.desc: Defines the state of the component (shown/hidden); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

breakpoint.desc: Breakpoint (in pixels) of window width from where a Menu will get to be used instead of a Dialog

touch-position.desc: Allows for the target position to be set by the mouse position, when in menu mode and the target of the menu is either clicked or touched
